The spirit of Eve Lania:
Hmm? You Sent Mysterious Dark Knight ? Hmm ... Well, if you have the case, then what can you do. And I so wanted to talk to you ... And then with the knight and not exchange a buzzword. It shows, however these places, it was a long time ago. Somber, silent ... Hung around here for a while, and then disappeared. You, too, have come just for business? Disappear too, as he did, without saying goodbye?
